page.title: 10HOME-LIFE, CWMBRAN
page.content: My brother and I return home and have tea with my family.Some evenings I go to Guides or Junior Fellowship.Some evenings I watch T.V.after practising on my flute.My brother and I go to bed between 9 p.m.and 9.30.p.m.After cleaning the house and washing and ironing Mum and Dad go to bed about 10.30.On Saturday and Sunday there is no school and my Mother does not go to work.Sometimes my Dad has a few days off as he is a shift worker.My Nan visits us on a Saturday and we some- times go for walks .My Dad plays Golf and gardens on a Sunday.My brother and I play with our friends in a nearby park.On Saturdays and Sundays we are allowed to stay -up until 10.p.m.to watch some of our favourite T.V. programmes.
